transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good evening sir. Abhi aawaz sahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Kuchh good nahi hua hai mera, sab kharab hua hai. Ye complaint likho.
Executive: Ji ji, bataiye kya issue hai sir?
Customer: Haan, Jolly Yadav ke koi ladki hai kya Jolly Yadav?
Executive: Haan haan, Jolly hai sir.
Customer: Haan, wo kidhar gayi?
Executive: Hai sir, team mein hi hai.
Customer: Usko bulao, conference pe lao thoda.
Executive: Conference pe hai lo main abhi na, ek minute rukiye.


Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good after, good evening sir.
Customer: Madam, kuchh good nahi hai.
Executive: Sorry sir, kya bol rahe hain aap?
Customer: Kuchh good nahi ho raha, aapne kya kya commitment kiya tha, aapne kya kya kiya?
Executive: Aapne jo products bole the line up karane ke liye, toh maine wo team ko diye the, that maps ke liye.
Customer: Team ka mat batao, maine pehle bhi aapko bataya tha ki do din mein ek baar try kar lete, isme aapko jyada bhi material nahi diya, thoda bhi kuchh bhi, main Friday se update le raha hu, tab se kuchh nahi update madam aapka. Last, ruko ruko, last call aapna kab hua tha?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Maine call utha time bhi bola tha aapko ki madam nahi ho jayega wo system.
Executive: Okay sir. But sir maine.
Customer: Maine bola nahi bola tha?
Executive: Ji bilkul, bilkul sir aapne bola tha sir.
Customer: Maine pehle hi toh bola tha ki khali month end ke liye pressure aata hai isliye aap log follow up lete ho.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Maine pehle sara clear karne ke baad bhi fir wahi kiya aap logo ne.
Executive: Sir yahan se jo hai aapke jo products hai wo map kara diye gaye hain but usme thoda sa issue aa raha hai sir. Aap kuchh photo.
Customer: Issue madam paanch year se ho raha hai. Issue aa raha hai toh humne renew ke liye na hi bol rahe the na. Us time bhi wahi kiya aapne.

Customer: Renew humne, hum bol rahe the kya renew karo, us time bhi utkarsh ko na bol rahe the hum.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Usme bhi wahi kiya. Renew kiya, dusra aadmi diya.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo gaya kidhar. Abhi har month ke liye koi na koi ek aadmi leta tha update, khali month, month ko call aaya toh hum samajh lete, khali aapko follow up pe dikhana hai ki hum us party se follow up le rahe hain lekin party kuchh dekhti nahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: But sir.
Customer: Kidhar gaya complaint wala ye?

Customer: Are kidhar gaya?

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes sir. Are complaint bolo, tumhara naam kya hai?
Executive: Mera naam Shubham hai sir.
Customer: Haan Shubham, complaint karo, likho.
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan kya kya bat diya hai, suna na wahi likhunga aap. Kaam nahi hua madam se, likho udhar. Kaam nahi kiya na unhone, ab mere ko update karo.
Executive: Theek hai sir, main aap dekhiye kaam aapka jo bhi cheeze hain, jo products wagera hain, theek hai mera already discussion ho gaya tha jab complaint aaya tha maine pura review kiya tha.
Executive: Theek hai. Tabhi unhone discussion kiya tha, theek hai. Toh unhone bola tha ki maine team ko diya. Ji ji. Directly main main main head kaun hai uska number de do. Aap beech mein strike hi ho jao.
Customer: Sir main, sir main hi. Mere ko dekhna hai system kaisa chalta hai aap logo ka.
Executive: Main hi inka manager hu. Theek hai sir, Jolly ka manager mera Kalyan abhi. Aap hi manager. Aap usko batao na kya karna hai usko, bolo abhi mere samne.
Customer: Kab se update le rahe hain wo log?
Executive: Jolly ek kaam karo sir ke sare product jo bhi sir ne products bheje hain aapko sare product ko proper theek hai jo specification wagera jo tumhe chahiye theek hai aap sir ko WhatsApp karo theek hai aap ek kaam kariye.
Customer: Are unse sab sara baat hua tha jin unko jo chahiye wo baith ke main customer counter chhod ke gaya, season chhod ke gaya, ja ke sara details liya, main khud kar raha tha main ye bhi bola ki jyada production nahi karna jyada properly kam karna hai. Nahi nahi jyada bahut hai agar dena hai mera itna paisa dubaya na IndiaMART ne har year, har year dubaya mere ko agar dena hai toh main sare 2000 products de dunga.
Customer: Karna padega.
Customer: Main pehle clear kar chuka hu lekin mere ko ye karna nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye 2000 aap bhi samajh rahe hain ek bar mein toh nahi ho payega. Dheere dheere karke agar thoda thoda product rahega toh.
Customer: Are main kya bol raha hu wo unhe samajh gaya na. Haan haan main samajh gaya main aapki baat samajh gaya. Help bhi nahi kar payenge hum utna help nahi ho payega. Jeni jitna hoga utna karenge. Are madam ko 10 product madam ko 10 product set karne ke liye 10 din lage hain abhi.
Customer: Teen product mere samne maine khud madam dekh rahi thi tab set kiya wahi product abhi bhi dikha rahe hain udhar. Isse pata chalta hai ki aap kitna kaam kar rahe hain udhar baith ke.
Executive: Ye sir aage se nahi hoga kabhi bhi repeat. Aap jo bolenge wo same day.
Customer: Paanch year se wahi ho raha hai har bar. Sir nahi nahi nahi. Is bar toh jo aayega na renew ke liye uske upar police complaint direct thokne wale hain hum. Call bhi nahi karna aur kuchh karna bhi nahi hai. Kyunki kya hai tum monthly muh pe kehte ho bahut bada fraud hai IndiaMART, bahut matlab bahut bada. Sir dekhiye actually dekhiye main samajh raha hu aapko paisa le rahe ho nahi nahi suno suno suno aap log paisa le rahe ho.
Customer: Har bar team change kar rahe ho. IndiaMART ke itne manager ke number hai mere paas ek bhi sahi se nahi hai.
Customer: Ek bhi sahi se nahi hai. Har bar wo mera complaint dekhte hain haan yes sir okay ye Jolly call kiya sara sara sara sara liya ye karenge ji wo karenge ji aisa karenge waisa sab kiya. Kuchh nahi. Kuchh kiya nahi baad mein. Main hi do teen bar question mark dala WhatsApp pe kya hua kya hua.
Executive: Achha aapne reply bhi nahi unke.
Customer: Reply nahi kiya unhone aapko.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai sir. Aisa kya? Nahi nahi sir main puchh raha hu maine dekha maine chat khola hua hai maine unka aapka chat na sir theek hai aapne bheja tha na last humne product bheja hua tha uske baad aapne kya hua Friday ko puchha uske baad aapne kal bhi puchha kuchh update nahi mila mam please share name theek hai toh aapne ye karke dala hua hai unko theek hai na. Nahi aap isliye bharosa nahi karte ye matlab main aur ye mera nuksan hai chalo mera toh 40 45000 aapne hadap liye koi problem nahi chalo utna ho jayega lekin iski wajah se koi renew bhi nahi kar raha dusri baat hamare ek branch manager IndiaMART ki taraf nahi ja raha.
Customer: Hamare abhi distributor se jitne bhi aa rahe hain sab bol rahe hain ki IndiaMART hum bhi karega hum kisi ko nahi bolte sachchi bolte muh pe bol dete fraud hai company. Paisa leti hai ha ha bolti hai product lagayenge ye karenge wo karenge karte toh kuchh nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye aisa nahi hota. Unko hum proof bhi dikha sakte hain hamare paas proof bhi hai sab IndiaMART wale manager ki chatting hai hamare paas hamare message jaye unke reply nahi aate. Khali wahi karte jab unko pressure aata follow up lene ke liye wo follow up lete follow up mein mere ko pata hai unko pata hai party bahut busy bahut calls rehte party ko. Unko pata hai party ko bahut busy call rehte continuously toh abhi aaj subah aapne call kiya tha kya bola main are mera kaam hi hai mere ko 500 ke upar daily call aate do mobile hai sabke paas mera mobile number hai toh aisa nahi hai ki mera manager bhi nahi hai directly main khud hi hu baki sab wo rate main hi final karta hu toh mere ko call aate jyada nahi 10 10 20 20 second wale hamare call hai toh busy lagega phone nahi karunga beech mein aap log aate jab business solve hue do rupaye kamana hai mere ko toh main kyu IndiaMART ke sath ye karo wo karo time kharab karunga.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekhiye ye cheez main honestly bol raha hu. Pehle wale ko toh raat ke 10 baje 11 baje ka time diya tha ek hi bar call kiya wo bhi gaya bhag ke baad mein.
Customer: Aisa nahi khali follow up ka hai complaint raise karo sabke upar ek bar dekh complaint karne ke baad bhi malik aayega ya nahi aayega dekhne ke liye.
Executive: Sir already dekhiye maine raise kiya hua hai uske complaint jab aapne customer care pe call kiya toh already complaint raise ho jata hai sir aap call karte hain us time hi aapka complaint raise ho jata hai aur honestly batau na sir ye product ka jo bhi hai sara already Jolly bol rahi hai ki maine kaam kar diya sara already aapka aaj sham tak aapko 6 baje tak aapko update milega pura product jo aapne bheja Jolly ko single product.
Customer: Tum mere ko call karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir 6 baje main aapko call karke update kar dunga aapke liye. Mere ko call karna main hi karunga aapko. Ji ji bilkul sir jo jo aapne jo jo detail bheja hai us detail ke sath sara product. Mere ko live karke dikhao khali 6 baje tum mere ko call karna. Main aapko call karta hu sir aapko theek hai na. Haan agar nahi hua toh ek kaam karna aap directly owner ka. Main escalate karunga main escalate karunga bilkul sir main escalate karunga aap aap baat kariye main apne senior ka bhi number dunga. Mobile mein khali check karunga ki aapne bilkul sir aapne wala main kaam dikhao aur pareshan aap log kaise karte agar main than liya na pura pareshan karna main time laga ke pareshan karunga. Nahi nahi sir dekhiye actually nahi aur isme dekhiye main honestly bol raha hu. Pareshan karunga baad mein bol aapko mere upar complaint karna. Nahi nahi sir dekhiye nahi nahi sir aisa kuchh nahi na mujhe aapka complaint karna tha ki obviously aapne hame paisa diya toh aap complaint kar sakte hain sir theek hai aur aapka abhi dekho abhi abhi dekho abhi kaam kitna baki hai. Exactly bol sir Shubham kaam kitna February mein paisa liya.
Customer: February mein last kuchh kaam nahi kiya. Fokat paisa liya hai ruko ruko ruko. December January dikhana February mein fir ek bar rona start karna renew karo. Matlab 12 mahine se 10 mahine free mein kaat liye aap logo ne khali do mahina thoda kaam karke dikhana fir ek bar wahi kand karna aap is bar wo success nahi hoga ye dhyan rakhna.
Executive: Is bar nahi hoga sir iske baad ye repeat nahi hoga. Is bar nahi nahi renew bhi nahi hoga is bar nahi is bar main complaint khud karne wala is bar main sunne hi nahi. Himanshu kidhar gaya Himanshu aapka boss.
Customer: Himanshu Himanshu dusri team mein move ho gaye sir. Are wo toh bahut galiya sun chuka hai already. Gali kha ke gaya hai wo bhi aaya tha wo wo bhi tha usne toh bahut galiya kha chuka hai. Nahi sir dekhiye main samajh raha hu wo bhi aisa wo wo bhi us us usko nahi laga wo nahi bola karne mere ko nahi hoga bola. Paisa liya kyu mere ko manager kyu banaya. Sir dekhiye main bol raha hu aapne jitna product bheja hai India jo kehta hai na ki khali renew karte time aap mitha bol ke kaam karte ho wo 100% match ho raha hai abhi. Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hai ye ye cheez unko bhi wahi bola hai humne wo log jo aap log jo aisa hi karoge ki hum thodi aapko dhundhne aayenge sir aap aapka session 10 se 15 din mein main change kar dunga aap bas please sir dekhiye support kariye main ye nahi keh raha ki support jo dekhiye main bhi usme kai cheez dekh raha hu sir jo mujhe lagta hai ki improve honi chahiye wo kuchh cheeze aapke end se honge aur jo aapko lag raha hai hamare end se wo main kara ke dunga. Bar bar kuchh pichhle pichhle month mein bar bar pichhle do month mein ek month aapka bar bar call kar raha tha ye atak gaya wo karna hai ye karna hai ye karna hai wo karna hai kya hua kuchh nahi hua. Wo kyu update karna tha are tu product bech rehne do profit khali wo mera dikhna toh chahiye profile. Nahi sir bilkul obviously wo toh main cheez hoti hai hamari profile hi toh main hota pura. Single three year se single three year se IndiaMART se ek bhi deal nahi hua. Abhi main usko main bolta hu bech bolta hu profit chhodo khali aap turnover bhi badhane ke liye kuchh kaam nahi hai khali aap mere wo 42 matlab 50 lumpsum idhar udhar utna paisa khali ja raha hai mera five years ho gaye mere IndiaMART ko renew karte khali pehle year hi kaam hua maine bhi kaam kiya aap logo ne bhi thoda kaam kiya uske baad aap hi khud dekho ki kitna kaam hua hai udhar se order hi nahi bhai wo aisa ka waisa gaya. Manager aap wo aapne dekh lena aapka khali ye kya hota hai jab aapko upar pressure aata follow up banana hai mangal murti call karna dikhana system pe ye dekho humne paanch bar call kiya party ko call nahi uthaya uthaya toh ye reason bataya record karna upar bhejna baat khatam follow up ho gaya baad mein mere upar aa jayega ki aap log call nahi uthate. Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hai. Ye simple tarika hai ye matlab ye dekhiye isliye hamari jo baat ho rahi hai wo record karte hain hamari baat bhi sir jo ho rahi hai recording end ho rahi hai isliye ho rahi hai taki hum log kya karega Shubham tu hi manager delete karega tu hi kand karega. Nahi nahi sir main kyu karunga sir dekhiye un sabka ye sir sir dekhiye wo time nahi raha hai ab ye jo cheez aapka hamara discussion ho raha hai kyuki complaint aap customer care pe karte hain toh complaint ho jata hai isliye maine aapko Jolly ko puchho ki tere ko problem kya hai tu nahi toh usi din usi main toh bol raha hu main agle din bol raha tha main toh do teen bar bol raha tha main unse discuss karunga main unse discuss karunga wo toh usi din agle din kar rahi thi kar rahi hai wo. Sir main is cheez ko unse discuss kar lunga aur ye sure karta hu ye kabhi aur main ek kaam karta hu sir dekhiye usme bhi aapko proper ek experience account manager maine usko ye bhi kaha tha ki tum khud karo ye kaam ek bar mere ko usko puchho ek bar maine bola bhi tha ek bar khali 25 product sahi se laga ke dekho uske baad nikal ja matlab ho jayega hamari taraf se pareshan nahi hai aap bhi pareshan hote ho hame pata hai hamara paisa baki khatam karna abhi gaya toh gaya main dimag se chhod chuka hu ki wo paisa mera barbad ho chuka hai abhi. Nahi nahi sir nahi aap bar bar yaad karte ho aap log call karke mere ko yaad aata hai ki are idhar mera 50000 gaya. Are nahi nahi nahi sir abhi barbad nahi hua abhi time hai hamare paas aur nikalunga aur honestly nikal jayega. Do mahine do mahine mein dekhta hu main toh bolta hu do mahine bhi mere ko profit ek rupees bhi mat karo mere ko khali kitne order bante turnover ek bhi order IndiaMART se aana main sabse pehle tumhe call karunga ha bhai tera order aaya 10000 main guarantee ke sath kehta hu ye profile sahi karne ke baad bhi order nahi aayenge pata hai ye kaisa sales team kaise kaam karti kyuki main bhi distributor hu mere paas bhi sare company ke employees idhar hi aate kaise karte mere ko pata hai. Sir abhi main isliye servicing part ka dekh raha hu na sales ke liye baaten nahi kar raha hu main servicing ka baat kar raha hu servicing bhi main hi karunga sir aapka theek hai sir sales toh tab hogi na jab hamara aapko lagaao plan 6 baje lagaao plan. Theek hai sir. Haan main 6 baje connect karta hu sir aapse aur ek bar discuss karte hain proper theek hai aur jo cheeze mujhe bhi lag rahi hai aisa nahi sir main utna time aap logo mera kya hai utna din nahi chalega mera kuchh business bana nahi chhota mota paanch chhe paanch sat lakh ka idhar udhar bana hai mere ko aur karna hai thoda on code karna hai main utna time aap mere ko 6 baje wo mere ko dikhao nahi toh mere abhi PC pe ho main check kar leta. Theek hai theek hai main 6 baje call karta hu aapka kaam 6 baje ho jayega discuss check karke aap jaisa bhi rahega fir aage proceed karenge theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- No improvement in services despite payment.

- Products not mapped properly.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART's services.

- Alleges fraudulent practices by IndiaMART.

- Team keeps changing, no proper resolution.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive assured to provide update by 6 PM.

- Executive assured escalation if issue persists.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer by 6 PM.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, products, follow up, renew, fraud
